alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Hopkins (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 1:36AM EDT until August 02 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN...SOUTHEASTERN CALDWELL AND SOUTHWESTERN HOPKINS COUNTIES... At 1236 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dawson Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crofton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 84 and 102. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 24 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
